title: Dangers of Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/25/19
itunes:title: Dangers of Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/25/19
description:
George Noory and digital anthropologist Brian Solis explore his research into the effects of digital technology on children and adults, and how it is shortening attention spans and making people more depressed and lonely.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A look at the dangers of smartphones and digital technology that are damaging human life.
